data.message:
I didn't even realize Eminem was still relevant. I thought he died in early 2000. 

Well he's not dead but his career just committed suicide. 

Fuck you Eminem. 

Sincerely,
A Trump supporter who used to be a fan.

replies.message: Lmao. Hey there princess. I must have offended you Jack Evans. Did I huwt your widdle feelings? Awwwwww. Poor widdle guy.
Jack Evans No..the granny in your pictures would be the old fuck Jack. Mike here looks to be about the same age as your loser eminem.
I'm only 39. Damn. Lol. Eminem is like 50.
Brother im not a fan of trump..but at the end of day he is our president.. What eminem did here was wack as fuck.
Don't contradict yourself too much. You were a fan, but thought he died years ago. Your insults are as weak as your hurt feelings
Dusty Jones I'm weak? I'm not the one who has to hide behind a fake profile to talk shit to strangers. Who's weak now you little bitch.
